name: yam and boba get some groceries
name_original: yam and boba get some groceries
description:
YAM AND BOBA GET SOME GROCERIES.

What is this? A puzzle game, but also a fighting game, but also a game within a game???
Either way, you need to get those groceries!!!! Very important groceries!

Alt-Enter to go to full-screen mode

Movement: WASD / Arrow keys

Action: Z / J and X / K

To my friends, the real life sweet potato and boba, a very happy 20th!

Many thanks to cottontrek for all his glorious help.

BGM from Purple Planet
